Lines: Why is this guy shouting at me?
He's saying you can't smoke here.
Wait, really? Lame...#Then where can I smoke?
I'm trying to tell him not to smoke here.
(To asian man) You can't smoke here, apparently.
Sir, we have rules. Smoking isn't allowed in the station.
I don't care. (Takes out a cigarette)
Then I'll have to give you both a fine, sorry.
Why is this guy shouting at me?
[ Do you know what that man is shouting? ]
Thanks, that's all I wanted to know.
Thanks, that's all I wanted to know.
The nearest food is in the supermarket right outside the station.
He's telling him not to smoke inside the station.
I want to buy weed, but I forgot my ID.
Thanks! Just buy whatever is cheapest.
Sorry, no.#Do you have a maestro maybe?
No. Where can I get one?
At the bank, across the center from here.
Ok, thanks! And sorry for all the... stuff.
Hello traveller.#What can I do for you?
Potion-seller, I want you to give me your strongest potion!
My potions are much too strong for you, traveller; they would surely kill you!
